activities: We will be gathering eligible users' contact information, including employee ID, last date of employment, address, phone number, email addresses, as well as job search preferences and employment history for the purposes of assisting them with the job search process.
eucountries: Belgium, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: client name, recent job title, company name,  telephone numbers, address, email address and other identification or contact information; information relevant to job search; milestone progression
